info.summary: Show README.md and HEADER.md gitlab style on your NextCloud !
info.description: Show README.md & HEADER.md gitlab style on your NextCloud ! With this app you can add a header and a footer to your nextcloud directories. This can be use to explain the goal of a directory, describe the content of a folder ... It show README.md in the way gitlab does.
